about_the_game:
An eternal classic of board games - a puzzle about collecting mosaics in realistic 3D. Ideal for those who want to relax and calmly collect pictures with pleasant music.
Visit an island of serenity in our raging world.

Game Features:
1. Intuitive mouse control, even a small child can handle it.
2. Selecting the number of details in the picture. From children's 4x3 to difficult 18x10.
3. A set of bright and varied images. Everyone will find something for themselves.
4. Low system requirements.

The game was created by one person. I will be glad if you play and enjoy. If possible, I will try to supplement the game with different features and content.

In the plans:
1. Increase the maximum number of parts.
2. Add new interesting shapes of mosaics.
3. Add a new more difficult mode with the rotation of parts.
4. Replenish the collection of images with new selections.
